title: Top Places to visit in Bengaluru Urban, Bengaluru, Karnataka
content: Bangalore Urban is a district of the Indian state of Karnataka. It is surrounded by the Bangalore Rural district on the east and north, the Ramanagara district on the west and the Krishnagiri district of Tamil Nadu on the south. title: Top Places to visit in Bidar, Karnataka
content: Bidar is a hill top city in the north-eastern part of Karnataka state in India. It is the headquarters of the Bidar which borders Maharashtra and Telangana. Top Places to visit in Chikkaballapur, Karnataka
content: Chikkaballapur is the district headquarters of the newly created Chikkaballapur district in the state of Karnataka, India. Top Places to visit in Dakshina Kannada, Mangaluru Karnataka
content: Dakshina Kannada is a district in the state of Karnataka in India. Sheltered by the Western Ghats on the east and surrounded by the Arabian Sea on the west, Dakshina Kannada receives abundant rainfall during the monsoon. title: Top Places to visit in Davanagere, Karnataka
content: Davangere is a city in the center of the southern Indian state of Karnataka. It is the seventh largest city in the state, and the administrative headquarters of eponymous Davangere District. title: Top Places to visit in Dharwad, Karnataka
content: Dharwad is the district headquarters of Dharwad district in the state of Karnataka, India. It was merged with the city of Hubballi in 1961 to form the twin cities of Hubballi-Dharwad. title: Top Places to visit in Gadag, Gadag Betageri, Karnataka
content: Gadag District is a district in the state of Karnataka, India. It was formed in 1997, when it was split from Dharwad District. Top Places to visit in Haveri, Karnataka
content: Haveri is a town in Karnataka, India, It is the administrative headquarters of Haveri District. The name Haveri is derived from the Kannada words havu and keri, which means place of snakes.
